short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spread out your tabs, across your screen... expose style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension to 'spread out' your tabs in a single window, similar to the expos√© feature on macOS. 

When you click the extnesion, it will evenly distribute your tabs across your screen in separate windows

this is useful for 2+ tab sessions, where you want to read two (or more) things at once.


currently, only 8 tabs (per window) are supported.
